member.name: DML_TENSOR_TYPE
member.summary: Identifies a type of tensor description.

member.name: DML_TENSOR_TYPE.DML_TENSOR_TYPE_INVALID
member.summary: Indicates an unknown tensor description type. This value is never valid.

member.name: DML_TENSOR_TYPE.DML_TENSOR_TYPE_BUFFER
member.summary: Indicates a tensor description that is represented by a Direct3D 12 buffer. The corresponding struct type is .
